rich_text_editor.customization_notes: Hide complex code block/formula buttons. Style the toolbar to match the Sage/Cream theme. Add ample padding inside the editor area to simulate a paper document.

toast.notes: Use for save confirmations and chat responses.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds; use solid warm cream colors or subtle textures.
Ensure all text has high contrast (WCAG AA) against the cream background.
Use 'Lato' for body text and UI elements.
Buttons should be pill-shaped (rounded-full) to feel friendly.
Inputs and cards should have soft rounded corners (rounded-lg or rounded-xl).
The Rich Text Editor must feel like a clean sheet of paper - remove the default heavy border of Quill and use a shadow instead.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE `tailwind.config.js` to include the custom colors (sage, cream, terracotta) and fonts.
5. CREATE a `ChatGPTAssistant` component (likely a sidebar or modal).
6. CREATE a `YouTubeList` component for storing video links.
7. IMPLEMENT LocalStorage or Mock Backend for recipe persistence (key: 'moms-recipes').
8. USE the provided image URLs for visual polish.
